subject: Security Alert: Unusual Account Activity Detected
content:
Dear {{name}},

Our security system has detected unusual login activity on your account. To ensure your account remains secure, please verify your identity by clicking the link below:

Verify Account Now

If you did not attempt to access your account, please reset your password immediately.

Thank you,
{{company}} Security Team

subject: Security Alert: Unusual Account Activity Detected
content:
Dear {{name}},

We have detected multiple failed login attempts to your {{company}} account. For security purposes, we need to verify your identity.

Please click here to confirm your account details and restore full access to your account.

This is an automated message. Please do not reply.

Regards,
Account Security

subject: Security Alert: Unusual Account Activity Detected
content:
Dear {{name}},

As part of our ongoing security measures, we regularly verify account activity. We've noticed some unusual patterns in your recent account usage.

To continue using your account without interruption, please confirm your account details within 24 hours.

If you have any questions, please contact support.

{{company}} Security

subject: Invoice #{{invoice_number}} from {{company}} is due
content:
Dear {{name}},

This is a reminder that invoice #{{invoice_number}} for services provided to {{company}} is due for payment.

Amount due: ${{invoice_amount}}
Due date: {{due_date}}

To view and pay your invoice, please click here.

Thank you for your business.

{{company}}

subject: Invoice #{{invoice_number}} from {{company}} is due
content:
Dear {{name}},

Your payment of ${{invoice_amount}} for invoice #{{invoice_number}} is now overdue.

To avoid late fees, please process this payment immediately by clicking here.

If you have already made this payment, please disregard this notice.

Regards,
Billing Department
